name: The Bindening of Isaac
description:
Isaac McMillin in That Boi Got Binded is a game which I completely ripped off from Edmund McMillin's The Binding of Isaac. The song during gameplay was stolen from the Binding of Isaac Antibirth OST. If someone from antibirth wants me to take their song out of the game, just let me know, and I'll do just that.

Controls:

Left stick or wasd: move

right stick or arrow keys: shoot

Works with XBox and Playstation controllers.
